content: As Val, tell me about how in that letter, Odyl admitted that she'd always been in love with Val, that she had fallen in love with her when they first knew each other, and that she had been alone all these years because Xirin only imprint on one person and then if heartbroken, channel that heartbreak into some kind of intense pursuit, and Odyl's feelings for Val had, over the years, fed her work and inspiration, even though they couldn't be together.
